title: Facebook's Libra currency at risk as major backers mull pulling out
text:
Facebook's plan for a new global digital currency looks in jeopardy after reports that two major credit card companies may pull out.

The social media giant had recruited 27 other firms to be founding members of the Libra Consortium, a group designed to protect the independence of its new coin, Libra, from Facebook itself.

But major backers including Visa and Mastercard are now considering whether to cut their ties following a massive global backlash from central banks and watchdogs, according to the Wall Street Journal.
